title: Sharp Convergence Rates of Empirical Unbalanced Optimal Transport for Spatio-Temporal Point Processes
summary: This paper statistically analyzes empirical plug-in estimators for unbalanced optimal transport formalisms between general intensity measures based on observations from spatio-temporal point processes, establishing sharp convergence rates.
usefulness_reason: The title and abstract directly and explicitly mention "Spatio-Temporal Point Processes" multiple times, which is the core of the search query. This paper is directly and substantially about the topic.
